categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kamdin was a male Human who served as a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, he was stationed at the Toxic Lake Garrison.

Sergeant Kamdin first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Heavy Armor vendor for the Empire on Taris. He was later removed from the game in a restructuring of the armor vendors.
